Text: ok first is this game in english, and second give me the info in english!

The is very large to translate. I got the info from the site of who made the patch. 
(the info is directed to Brazilian guys. The info , first two lines have the info in english)

Basic is 

The game is PAL and NTSC (have selector)
The language of the game is (english, French, German and Spanish) text and commentary.

Brazilian League (replaced the French league)
20 Brazilian Team.
Include , design , stadium , balls and uniforms, music , pictures.
The new world cup 2006 ball design.
New teams included in World Cup 2006.

And obvious all Leagues and Teams of the original PES5.

I forgot to say.
If you have saved in your memory card other PES5 games before , you need to erase all files from your memory card before play this game. If not, the name of the player(and other things) don't will show correct.
